title: There is a severe lack of punishments
body: It happens way too often that I recall getting called subhuman, dog, r%%%%%, etc, but it feels like no one gets punished for this kind of behaviour. On average, I would say that i report once every 2 or 3 games a person for being unsportsmanlike when it comes to what they say in game, yet i have not seen a instant report feedback since season 8 (literally). I have made in total 8 tickets but I think no one got banned. Has riot's policy towards toxicity and negativity subtly change into an indifferent stance? If not why am I seeing no punishments

replies.body:
You do know that most of the time you won't receive an ifr if someone gets punished from your report
So, you not getting any ifrs doesn't mean that they didn't get punished, it just means that you just didn't happen to get the notification

If you honestly think nobody is getting punished in league, just go read the boards for a while
